servers.description: The default ( development ) endpoint on a local ( development ) host

get.summary: Get's the current version of the tremor server
get.description:
This endpoint returns version information for the current
version of tremor. Versioning policy follows [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/)

This endpoint returns the runtime status of the tremor server.
It returns a summary of the status of all deployed flows and
contains a flag `all_running` to check if all flows are alive and well.

200.description: The current status of the tremor runtime if all flows are in "running" state

503.description: The current status of the tremor runtime otherwise

get.summary: Get information on all flows in the tremor runtime.
get.description:
Get information on all flows in the tremor runtime.
It returns an array with 1 item for each flow with information on name,
current status and connectors.

parameters.name: flow-id
parameters.description: The unique id of the flow in the runtime

404.description: The flow 'flow-id' wasnt found. It is thus not deployed in the runtime.

patch.summary: change the status of a flow

200.description: The new status of the flow after applying the patch

400.description: Error during patch operation, due to invalid status transition.

404.description: The flow 'flow-id' wasnt found. It is thus not deployed in the runtime.

parameters.name: flow-id
parameters.description: The unique id of the flow in the runtime

get.summary: Get detailed information on all connectors in the flow identified by 'flow-id'

200.description: A list of connector information items for all connectors created with in flow 'flow-id'

404.description: The flow 'flow-id' wasnt found. It is thus not deployed in the runtime.

parameters.name: flow-id
parameters.description: The unique id of the flow in the runtime

parameters.name: connector-id
parameters.description: The unique id of the connector within the flow

get.summary: Get detailed information on the connector 'connector-id' in the flow 'flow-id'.

404.description: The flow 'flow-id' or the connector 'connector-id' within flow `flow-id' wasnt found. It is thus not deployed in the

patch.summary: change the status of a connector

200.description: The new status of the connector after the patch

400.description: Error during patch operation, due to invalid status transition.

404.description: The flow 'flow-id' or the connector 'connector-id' within flow `flow-id' wasnt found. It is thus not deployed in the

debug.description: True if this is a debug build

all_running.description: flag that is true if all flows are currently in a running state

initializing.description: The number of flows in initializing state, not yet running

running.description: The number of flows in running state

paused.description: The number of flows in paused state

draining.description: The number of flows in draining state

stopped.description: The number of flows in stopped state

failed.description: The number of flows in failed state

status.description: runtime status of a flow or connector instance

flows.description: List of information on deployed flows

connectors.description: aliases of connectors in the flow

patch_status.description: encodes the intended status to switch to

status.description: Valid statusses flows and connectors can be switched to

connector.description: Information on a single connector, including current runtime status and connected pipelines

connectivity.description: denoting whether this connector is connected to its external system

additionalProperties.description: A map of connector port to the connected pipeline id and port.

items.description: The id (or alias) of a connected pipeline and the pipeline-port with which they are connected to this connector.

port.description: Name of the port with the pipeline is connected to this connector.

example.error: Cannot patch status of connector non_existent_file in flow flow_02 from failed to running
